statements: DELETE FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE lighting_id = 5 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE lighting_mode = 'night_mode' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01 18:00:00';
DELETE FROM security_camera_logging WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-05-15 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM security_camera_logging WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE light_id = 2 AND setting = 'night mode';
DELETE FROM lighting_automation WHERE automation_id IN (SELECT automation_id FROM camera_lighting_mapping WHERE camera_id = 'CAM002');
DELETE FROM camera_lighting_mapping WHERE camera_id = 'c123456' AND automation_id = 'a987654';
